column1: Appendix table 11. Standard errors for table 16: Cumulative percent of state prisoners released in 24 states in 2008 who were arrested outside of the state of release, by sex, race or ethnicity, age at release, and year following release
Report title: Recidivism of Prisoners Released in 24 States in 2008: A 10-Year Follow-Up Period (2008–2018)  NCJ 256094
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Recidivism of State Prisoners Released in 2008 data collection, 2008–2018
Authors: Leonardo Antenangeli, Ph.D., and Matthew R. Durose, BJS Statisticians

Appendix table 11. Standard errors for table 16: Cumulative percent of state prisoners released in 24 states in 2008 who were arrested outside of the state of release, by sex, race or ethnicity, age at release, and year following release
